CustomField.formula: ( ( 40 * ( Influence_Parent__r.Total_Records__c - AIP_Rank__c ) ) + ( 25 * ( Influence_Parent__r.Total_Records__c - PR_Rank__c ) ) + ( 20 * ( Influence_Parent__r.Total_Records__c - ACD_Rank__c ) ) + ( 10 * ( Influence_Parent__r.Total_Records__c - F_Rank__c ) ) + ( 5 * ( Influence_Parent__r.Total_Records__c - CC_Rank__c ) ) / 100 ) / Influence_Parent__r.Total_Records__c
CustomField.label: Influence Formula
